languages.text: "Эта мон-кай искусно плетет ловушку — с острыми гранями, с безжалостными путами. Но вновь кровью. Смертью... Не как охотница, но как убийца".

traits.locale_text: "Эта мон-кай искусно плетет ловушку — с острыми гранями, с безжалостными путами. Но вновь кровью. Смертью... Не как охотница, но как убийца".

languages.text: "This mon-keigh makes her traps deftly — with sharp edges and relentless bonds. Yet, once again, she uses blood. Blood and death... Not as a hunter, but as a killer."
languages.original_text: "Эта мон-кай искусно плетет ловушку — с острыми гранями, с безжалостными путами. Но вновь кровью. Смертью... Не как охотница, но как убийца".

traits.locale_text: "This mon-keigh deftly makes her traps — with sharp edges and relentless bonds. Yet once again, she uses blood. Blood and death... Not as a hunter, but as a killer."
"This mon-keigh deftly makes her traps — with sharp edges and relentless bonds. Yet once again, she uses blood. Blood and death... Not as a hunter, but as a killer."
"This mon-keigh makes her traps deftly — with sharp edges and relentless bonds. Yet, once again, she uses blood. Blood and death... Not as a hunter, but as a killer."

"This mon-keigh makes her traps deftly — with sharp edges and relentless bonds. Yet, once again, she uses blood. Blood and death... Not as a hunter, but as a killer."

languages.text: «Esta mon-keigh monta sus trampas con destreza: usa bordes afilados y lazos impecables. No obstante, también usa sangre. Sangre y muerte... No como cazadora, sino como asesina».
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh makes her traps deftly — with sharp edges and relentless bonds. Yet, once again, she uses blood. Blood and death... Not as a hunter, but as a killer."

traits.locale_text: «Esta mon-keigh monta sus trampas con destreza: usa bordes afilados y lazos impecables. No obstante, también usa sangre. Sangre y muerte... No como cazadora, sino como asesina».

languages.text: 「このモン＝ケイは巧みに罠を仕掛ける。鋭利な刃と容赦ない縛りで。しかし、またしても彼女は血を使う。血と死を…ハンターとしてではなく、殺人者として」
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh makes her traps deftly — with sharp edges and relentless bonds. Yet, once again, she uses blood. Blood and death... Not as a hunter, but as a killer."

traits.locale_text: 「このモン＝ケイは巧みに罠を仕掛ける。鋭利な刃と容赦ない縛りで。しかし、またしても彼女は血を使う。血と死を…ハンターとしてではなく、殺人者として」

languages.text: “这只猴子设置陷阱的技术非常出色，陷阱的钢齿无比锋利，绝不会放开猎物。然而，她却再次使用了鲜血的力量。鲜血与死亡……不是猎人，而是杀手。”
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh makes her traps deftly — with sharp edges and relentless bonds. Yet, once again, she uses blood. Blood and death... Not as a hunter, but as a killer."

traits.locale_text: “这只猴子设置陷阱的技术非常出色，陷阱的钢齿无比锋利，绝不会放开猎物。然而，她却再次使用了鲜血的力量。鲜血与死亡……不是猎人，而是杀手。”

languages.text: "Diese Chem-Pan-Sey stellt ihre Fallen geschickt ... mit scharfen Kanten und unerbittlich. Und doch verwendet sie erneut Blut. Blut und Tod ... Nicht als Jägerin, sondern als Mörderin."
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh makes her traps deftly — with sharp edges and relentless bonds. Yet, once again, she uses blood. Blood and death... Not as a hunter, but as a killer."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Chem-Pan-Sey stellt ihre Fallen geschickt ... mit scharfen Kanten und unerbittlich. Und doch verwendet sie erneut Blut. Blut und Tod ... Nicht als Jägerin, sondern als Mörderin."

languages.text: « Cette mon-keigh sait préparer ses pièges avec soin, sans rechigner sur les lames tranchantes et les liens impitoyables. Et pourtant, une fois encore, elle a recours au sang. Au sang et à la mort.... Elle n'agit pas en chasseresse, mais en tueuse. »
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh makes her traps deftly — with sharp edges and relentless bonds. Yet, once again, she uses blood. Blood and death... Not as a hunter, but as a killer."

traits.locale_text: « Cette mon-keigh sait préparer ses pièges avec soin, sans rechigner sur les lames tranchantes et les liens impitoyables. Et pourtant, une fois encore, elle a recours au sang. Au sang et à la mort.... Elle n'agit pas en chasseresse, mais en tueuse. »

languages.text: "Bu mon-keigh, keskin kenarları ve acımasız bağlarıyla tuzaklarını ustaca hazırlıyor. Ancak bir kez daha kana başvuruyor. Kan ve ölüm... Avcı gibi değil, katil gibi davranıyor."
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh makes her traps deftly — with sharp edges and relentless bonds. Yet, once again, she uses blood. Blood and death... Not as a hunter, but as a killer."
